title: J. M. Coetzee - Novels, Autobiographies, Letters (17 books)
description:
JOHN MAXWELL "J. M." COETZEE (b. 1940) is a South African novelist, essayist, linguist, translator and recipient of the 2003 Nobel Prize in Literature.  He has lived in Australia since 2002.

Coetzee has been described as "inarguably the most celebrated and decorated" living writer in the Anglosphere.  In addition to the Nobel Prize, he has been awarded the CNA Prize (thrice), the Prix Femina Ãƒâ€°tranger, The Irish Times International Fiction Prize and the Booker Prize (twice), among other accolades.

In recent years, Coetzee has become a vocal critic of animal cruelty and advocate for the animal rights movement.  Coetzee's fiction has similarly engaged with the problems of animal cruelty and animal welfare, in particular his books DISGRACE, THE LIVES OF ANIMALS and ELIZABETH COSTELLO.

Coetzee's published work consists of fiction, fictionalised autobiographies (in the mode of what he terms "autrebiography"), criticism, translations, and poetry.


All the following books are in EPUB format; several others, as specified, are also available in PDF:

* THE AGE OF IRON (Secker & Warburg, 1990) -- EPUB + PDF

* BOYHOOD: Scenes from Provincial Life I (Penguin, 1997) -- EPUB + PDF

* THE CHILDHOOD OF JESUS (Harvill Secker, 2013)

* DIARY OF A BAD YEAR (Harvill Secker, 2007)

* DISGRACE (Penguin, 2000) -- EPUB + PDF

* ELIZABETH COSTELLO (Secker & Warburg, 2003)

* FOE (Penguin, 1987) -- EPUB + PDF

* HERE AND NOW: Letters, 2008-2011 [with Paul Auster] (Penguin, 2013)

* IN THE HEART OF THE COUNTRY (Penguin, 1982) -- EPUB + PDF

* LIFE AND TIMES OF MICHAEL K (Vintage, 1983)

* THE LIVES OF ANIMALS (Princeton University Press, 1999) -- EPUB + PDF

* THE MASTER OF PETERSBURG (Secker & Warburg, 1994) -- EPUB + PDF

* SCENES FROM PROVINCIAL LIFE (Vintage, 2011) [edited single volume of Boyhood: Scenes from Provincial Life, Youth: Scenes from Provincial Life II, and Summertime]

* SLOW MAN (Secker & Warburg, 2005)

* SUMMERTIME: Scenes from Provincial Life III (Harvill Secker, 2009)

* WAITING FOR THE BARBARIANS (Secker & Warburg, 1980) -- EPUB + PDF

* YOUTH: Scenes from Provincial Life II (Vintage, 2003) -- EPUB + PDF
